songs.title: No Way Around It
songs.lyrics:
(Verse 1)
Ain't no way around it
Yeah we working yeah we bout it
Took a loss and got up out it
Got this weight up on my shoulders
Roasting fonto like its folgers
I see haters imitators
Flaunting like they got that paper
But my energy from home
Kept a nigga in the zone
I can't trust another soul
Cuz niggas plotting on my own
Look at Big, look at Pac
Look at X, look at Stretch
Keep a tec
Got a vet
Keep my foot up on they neck
Its bout respect
Aye many people told me I been blessed
Cuz ain't no real niggas out here left
And where im from its money or its stress
Thats why these niggas want me dead cuz im the best
Yeah
Aye shorty call me up yeah she best yeah
Keep a nigga checked yeah rolling up the best yeah
I can never switch up you got beef you wear a vest yeah
Get chu some respect yeah after you can flex there

(Chorus)
Ain't no way around it
Money and the hoes yeah
Ain't no way around it
Cars and the clothes yeah
Ain't no way around it
Friends turn to foes yeah
Ain't no way around it
Yeah yeah yeah Ain't no way around it (x4)

(Verse 2)
Aye
Ain't no way around it
Shorty want a thousand
Throw a fucking pile in
When you keep it real
You got no time for all that clown shit
Money be the reason we be cheesing when we smiling
From the streets boy
Keep a big toy
Middle finger to the judge
Fuck a beef boy
You a fraud you ain't made up in the streets boy
You a fiend you ain't never sell no D boy
We kept it real when niggas really threw the towel in
I count so many people lost its like a thousand
I do this shit for niggas cooped up in that housing
With many dreams of turning rocks into a mountain
Its real rap and real life you niggas clowning
Free my daddy free my niggas from the ground shit
Thought this game was something sweet
When I hopped in
This game is full of drama ain't no way around it

(Chorus)
Ain't no way around it
Money and the hoes yeah
Ain't no way around it
Cars and the clothes yeah
Ain't no way around it
Friends turn to foes yeah
Ain't no way around it
Yeah yeah yeah Ain't no way around it (x4)
